name: Tamagotchi!
description:
This game is not intended for those under the age of 16 or those who are easily disturbed.

*

The Tamagotchi craze is back!

Introducing a remake of the original Tamagotchi! experience! Feed your pet, play minigames, earn credits, and have fun!

This is only the demo. To try out the full game, please consider purchasing the full version!

*
